thread.title: Great Hotel in Center Paris
thread.title_full: Great Hotel in Center Paris - Review of Hotel Augustin - Astotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: abaabfou
title: Great Hotel in Center Paris
text:
I am staying in this hotel very regularly (once a month).
The rooms are modern, clean and cosy.
Great location for tourism but also business.
The hotel is almost always fully booked.
Honestly there is unfortunately no frequent traveler special consideration (too bad for me :)).
If that's not what you are looking for the hotel is for you.
The buffet is really ok for breakfast.
But that would be nothing without the great team welcoming you every day with a smile and a nice word.
Special mention to Houria, Myriam and Souad!
Such a kind and professional team.
